description: Action order transcription user and instant information.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACT_ORD_TRAN_USR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user who transcribes the order as being active to the paper Medication Administration Record (MAR).

columns.name: ACT_ORDER_TRAN_DTTM
columns.description: The instant (date/time) that the user transcribes the order as being active to the paper MAR (medication administration record).
